name: libcap2
comment: This package is dual licensed under BSD-3-Clause or GPL-2.0-only. To facilitate automatic use, a default license choice of BSD-3-Clause is denoted in the Acknowledgment section of the OSS and OSSelot disclosure documents. This shall not restrict the freedom of users to choose either BSD-3-Clause or GPL-2.0-only. In case you want to use the package under GPL-2.0-only you need to modify the license choice accordingly. Anyway, all license texts are provided.
